forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 12C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 53F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 18C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
